Suspense, Drama, Bleak, Downbeat

Nature's Great Events: The Family Life of Animals: The Wonders of Life's Beginnings
Special Interest
["Courtship, childrearing and coming of age. Real dramas of survival from the animal kingdom come to life in this mesmerizing series that captures nature's rarest, most exotic, and amazing creatures in their natural habitats, and learn how they have adapted and flourished in some of the world's harshest terrains."]

Frankel the Superhorse: The Greatest Racehorse of All Time
Sports, Documentary, Special Interest
["This is the story of a perfect partnership, between a racehorse named Frankel and a man, Sir Henry Cecil, and how Frankel's stunning career restored the aristocrat's reputation for genius. Frankel's legendary victories made him one of the most expensive stallions of all time. This thrilling story is now told on film for the first time through exclusive access to the people and the horse."]
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Chris Durlacher'], 'Producers': ['Jeremy Bradshaw']}
Great movie, great horse and trainer!!
